content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5)

### Lab at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5)
- Connected to multiple small electric poles for power supply.

### Small electric pole group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Small electric pole (position 10.5, 13.5)
- Small electric pole (position 9.5, 13.5)
- Small electric pole (position 14.5, 9.5)
- Small electric pole (position 12.807692307692308, 10.807692307692308)
- Small electric pole (position 12.928571428571429, 10.714285714285714)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to place small electric poles
- Ensure you have small electric poles in your inventory before attempting to place them. An error occurred when trying to place a small electric pole without having any in inventory.

### Errors when connecting lab to electric poles
- Check the status of the electric poles before connecting them to the lab. If the poles are not plugged into an electric network, the lab will remain without power.

### Errors when accessing attributes of electricity groups
- Avoid accessing attributes that do not exist for certain objects. An error occurred when trying to access the 'energy' attribute of an 'ElectricityGroup' object, which does not have this attribute.

### General inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have the necessary items for building and connecting structures.
